# word2num

A simple Python library that converts English words into a list of numbers representing the positions of each letter in the alphabet.

For example: `"Apple"` â†’ `[1, 16, 16, 12, 5]`
(`A=1`, `B=2`, ..., `Z=26` â€” case-insensitive)
